section.name: Introduction
section.p: NetServe provides a set of components useful for creating a Network Server. This includes an abstraction for creating sockets, an implementation of the Acceptor/Connector pattern from ACE for both stream based and packet based connections, etc.

section.name: Multi-Container support
section.p: NetServe implementations are designed to support deployment in different containers or frameworks, while honouring the same API.

subsection.name: Avalon Framework Container
subsection.p: Avalon Framework supports Inversion of Control (IoC), via a set of interfaces.

AvalonConnectionManager provides an implementation of the
ConnectionManager interface which is Avalon-compatible.

subsection.name: Pico Container
subsection.p: Pico Container supports IoC in a more agile and embeddable way, without the need to import any external interface or class.

PicoConnectionManager provides an implementation of the
ConnectionManager interface which is Pico-compatible.
